title: Place on 10-Day DL Permissions - Club - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2304252

Acceptance Criteria: 
ADMIN: 
* Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transactions. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.
 
      However, there are exceptions:
      1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
      2. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field

* Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
      1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
      2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
      3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
 
* Can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Majnor League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org".


BASIC:
* Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.

          However, there are exceptions:
                  1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
                  2. They cannot edit or change these transactions (Basic only)
                  3. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field
 
* Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
    1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
    2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
    3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: As a user I want to submit a place on 10-day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
Given user has created and submitted “DL transaction” to BOC for Approval 

cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Log in as BOC select the player that has “DL transaction” submitted for approval

https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
custom_expected:
* Submit to BOC button is available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is blue. 
* Submit button is available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is grey.
* Clicking Submit will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. 
* Clicking Submit will run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass).
* After the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
* System reloads the transaction in view mode, and displays a successful submit blue notification. 
* Once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in Player's Player History: Code = DL10J, Description = Place on 10-day DL
* From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields [required]
* Entry appears in green font
* Once the transaction has successfully been submitted, the system sets the player's pending major league roster status to "10-Day DL"

title: As a user I want to see what Recertifications are due for a player on my Recertifications tab

Wireframe: 
http://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertification

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Recertification Due" column will be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire). 
* For a 7-Day Concussion DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 7 days after the placement date. The following will be 7 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 10-Day DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 10 days after the placement date. The following will be 10 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 60-Day DL placement, there are no recertifications due so the column will remain blank. 
* Each 7 and 10 Day row will always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future. (Ex: If there is a recertification due for a player on the 10 Day DL that is Due on May 1st, the form will display May 1st, as well as a May 11th Recertification due date, but will NOT display a May 21st Recertification due date until it is past May 11th.)

title: As a user I want to receive an email when a player requires a DL Recertification
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, email, mj - place on 10 day dl, mj - recertify a player
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
*Note nothing is changing for this story from previously - just ensuring that this functionality still works with the change from a 15-Day DL to a 10-Day DL*

* The system should check nightly to see if any new players require a DL recertification. 
* If not, no action is taken. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Emails" is set to Yes. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for Clubs for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the player's Org.
* The system also checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for the BOC for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the BOC.
* The date shown is the earliest recert due for that player.  For example, Holliday had a recert due 9/26, but since he also didn't have his 8/27 and 9/11 recerts, the e-mail shows 8/27.
* The email should follow the below example.

Example: 
From: e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com [mailto:e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 26, 2016 12:52 PM
To: youremail@yourdomain.com
Subject: DL E-Recert

Matthew Holliday DL Recertification due 08/27/2016

title: As a user I want to receive a Notification for a player that is up for recertification or reinstatement
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl, mj - recertify a player, nightly notification
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Using the same logic as #130338071, nightly the system will check if any Major League players currently on the 7 day Concussion DL or 10 Day  DL have a recertification due on the current date
* If a player is found to meet either or both of the above criteria, a notification is sent to the BOC- Major- Trans- Admin and Club  Major-Trans-Admin group that the player belongs to even if the user did not receive and email. 
* Date column is the Date the notification was generated 
* Type: Transaction
* Org: Org that the player belongs too 
* Notification Description: The Player is up for recertification or reinstatement by [date]

title: As a user I want to be prevented from initiating a recertification for a player that has not been on the appropriate DL

custom_expected:
THEN
-System will check to see if the player submitted/approved transactions (DL07J, DL10J, TR10J, RECRT) from the current year which match (or post-date) the latest placement, transfer, or release tx. 
-If no transaction exists, the player is not eligible. If a transaction exists, the recertification date must be before the last game of the season.
**Message**
**Body:** "No re-certifications are required for this player."
**Button(s):** Back - Clicking Back will return the user to the entry point.

title: As a user I want the player to have the proper Roster Status assigned on Rehab Assignment and Return from Rehab
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl, on submit rule
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* Submitting a Place on Rehab Assignment transaction for a player currently on the 10 Day DL will update the player's pending MJ roster status to "Rehab 10-Day DL". 
* Approving a Place on Rehab Assignment transaction for a player currently on the 10 Day DL will update the player's current MJ roster status to "Rehab 10-Day DL".
* Submitting a Return from Rehab Assignment transaction for a player currently on the Rehab 10-Day DL will update the player's pending MJ Roster status to "10-Day DL".
* Approving a Return from Rehab Assignment transaction for a player currently on the Rehab 10-Day DL will update the player's current MJ Roster status to "10-Day DL".

title: As a user I want to edit an existing transfer to 10-day DL transaction for a player

title: As a user I want to cancel creation of or changes to transfer to 10-day DL transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user is attempting to create a new Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction
OR user is attempting to edit an existing transaction
AND user has the form open in edit mode
AND "Cancel" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made
AND if they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction
BUT f they confirm the cancellation and the form has been previously saved in the system, then the form should be reloaded in the default mode (view/edit) for the current transaction state, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected
AND if they do not confirm the cancellation then the user should be returned to the form and no action should be taken

title: As a user I want to submit a Transfer to the 10-Day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user is attempting to submit a Transfer to 10-Day DL tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user has navigated to the form in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN Submit to BOC button should be available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be blue
AND Submit button should be available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be grey
AND clicking Submit should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND clicking Submit should run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass)
AND after the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"  
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification. Messages #76
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL then their pending MJ Roster Status should be set to to Rehab 10 Day DL
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion DL then the player's pending MJ roster status should be set to to 10 Day DL
AND once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = TR10J, Description = Transfer to 10-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND when a transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC" an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND if a file is attached to the transaction, that should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND if Comments are populated on the transaction, they should display in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name should open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND  "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

custom_steps:

title: Transfer to 10-Day DL Permissions - Club - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2304252

Acceptance Criteria: 
ADMIN
* Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transactions. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.
 
      However, there are exceptions:
      1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
      2. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field

* Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
      1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
      2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
      3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
 
* Can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Majnor League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org".

BASIC
* Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.

          However, there are exceptions:
                  1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
                  2. They cannot edit or change these transactions (Basic only)
                  3. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field
 
* Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
 
    1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
    2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
    3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Transfer to 10-Day DL Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as a CLUB user or BOC to see what permission they have processing “Transfer to 10-day DL”

cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl
custom_steps:
When dealing with an “DL Transaction”


Roles and Permissions: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2304252
custom_expected:
ADMIN
* Can view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players.
* Can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
* Can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players.
* Can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags.

BASIC
* Can view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players but cannot make any changes or e-sign.
* Can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.

title: As a user I want to be able to delete a Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl

GIVEN a Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction is still in Preliminary or in Rejected states
AND user has Edit permission
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user will see a "Delete" button on the form in grey, in either view or edit mode. 
AND clicking "Delete" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form from the system.
**Body:** Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with transaction type)
**Hint:** This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
**Buttons:** Yes, No
AND If they confirm the deletion, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction. 
AND If they do not confirm the deletion, then they should be returned to the form and no action should be taken. 
AND Deleted transactions should not appear on the front end or be searchable.

title: As a BOC user I want approving a Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction to create an entry in the daily transaction bulletin
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* When a Transfer to 10-day DL transaction is approved it should appear on the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Transfer to 10-day DL - Earliest Reinstatement Date [ insert earliest reinstatement date]"
* When a Transfer to 10-day DL transaction is reversed, if the "approved" bulletin entry is still on the Pending Bulletin, it should be removed. If it was on a previous Bulletin, then a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Transfer to 10-day - Earliest Reinstatement Date [ insert earliest reinstatement date] - Reversed" 
* When a Transfer to 10-day DL transaction is suppressed, if the "reversed" bulletin entry is still on the Pending Bulletin, it should be removed. from the daily bulletin

title: As a user I want to be able to add a new Authorized Signatory from a Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl

GIVEN the user has edit capabilities for the authorized signatory widget  
AND user creating a Transfer to 10-Day DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'New' link above the Authorized Signatory field
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch a modal that allows the user to enter a new Authorized Signatory for the player's Org. 
AND the checkbox associated with the form the user is adding a new signatory from will be auto checked and disabled.
AND the Save button will be disabled until all required fields have been populated.
AND clicking "Save" will add the authorized signatory to the system and close the modal, with the "Authorized Signatory" field pre-populated with the newly added Authorized Signatory. 
AND the Authorized SIgnatory will be added to the authorized signatory widget and will appear for the Org for all users that have permission to view that Org's Authorized Signatories.
AND clicking Cancel will cancel the addition of the authorized signatory, and return the user to the form.

title: As a Club user I want to receive an Action Item if a transfer to 10-Day DL transaction is still missing an attachment with a label = "Standard Form of Diagnosis" 3 days after the entered transfer date
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl, nightly notification
custom_steps:
See Clipboard Rules (#7): 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309008

Acceptance Criteria:
* System will check to see if any submitted or approved transfer to 10-day DL transactions are missing an attachment with the label "Standard Form of Diagnosis" that has a Transfer Date that is three or more days ago if the form has an SFD Received checkbox. 
* If yes, an action item will be generated for the Club according to the Clipboard Requirements.
* "Description" will be a hyperlink.
* Clicking on the description hyperlink will open the transaction in edit mode in the same window/tab. 
* Player's name will be a hyperlink.
* Clicking on the player's name hyperlink will open the player's profile in view mode in the same window/tab on the Player History tab.

title: As a user, I want my action item to be removed when I attach an SFD to a Transfer to 10 Day  DL transaction
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a file is uploaded to a Transfer to 10 Day with a Standard Form Diagnosis label, on save or approve, the system will check if there are any action items associated with that transaction. 
* If an action item is found, the item will be removed from the Club's Action Item's Clipboard.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Notice of Disposition for a transfer to 10-day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl, printing

GIVEN user opens a Transfer to 10-day DL transaction
And have permission to Print
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on Print (Print button will appear only if user have permission to print.)
AND selects 'Notice of Disposition'
custom_expected:
THEN system will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND the English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
OR selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish IF the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND the Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format.

title: As a user I want to receive a error/warning if the player has a 10 Day DL status and the request date is before the earliest reinstatement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MJ player has one of the following Current or Pending MJ League statuses:
	7 Day Concussion DL
	Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL
	10 Day DL
	Rehab 10 Day DL
	60 Day DL
        Rehab 60 Day DL
OR an Optioned player has a Minor League DL status of: 
	7 Day DL
	Rehab 7 Day DL
	60 Day DL
	Rehab 60 Day DL 
AND a user is attempting to request waivers for the player 
AND request date for the waivers is before earliest reinstatement date from the  player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" on the waiver request
custom_expected: THEN clicking submit should generate a blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the DL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [DL Reinstatement Date].”, which should be overrideable for BOC

title: As a user I want to see the player fixed header display better on smaller screen sizes
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into the system in screen sizes below 768px wide
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in player profile
custom_expected:
THEN
Header display should match the following requirments:
- the font-size of h1 in the fixed header will be 20px
- Position of the create new icon will line up with the player's name and position
- the Org logo will be smaller, something around height:34px;
- Org logo will be Vertically centered with the player name and info
- the right grey line to the right of the tabs dropdown arrow will not be there
- Vertically center the tab dropdown arrow
- the padding and margins will have 12px of space to the left of the Org logo and to the right of the tab dropdown arrow.

title: As a user I want the blue and red notification banners to display properly on screens smaller than 768px wide
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in on a screen smaller than 768px wide
custom_steps: WHEN system displays a blue or red notification banner
custom_expected:
THEN banner should be centered
AND the close icon should be visible and clickable
AND the entire message should be visible on the screen

title: As a user I want a mobile friendly way to interact with buttons on a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in on a mobile device or a device with smaller screen
custom_steps: WHEN user interacts with buttons on a form
custom_expected:
THEN behavior of buttons on a form should change to what is outlined in the wireframe
AND a container should be fixed to the bottom of the mobile browser
AND touching or swiping this up should reveal the form buttons
AND if the button container is open the arrow at the top should point down instead of up
AND the most important button(blue) should be at the bottom, the next on top of that, and so on. (On desktop the buttons display from left to right in order of importance, on a phone they will display from bottom to top)
AND clicking a button should perform that action and close the button container

title: As a user I want to use the left/main navigation and submenus on phone size devices
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on phone size devices.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into the system 
And uses the left/main nav
custom_expected:
THEN
- Main navigation links should display a down arrow
- The clock should appear on a single line
- Clicking on a main navigation item reveals the submenu
- When a submenu is visible the corresponding main nav item should have an up arrow instead of a down arrow
- Clicking on a main nav item with an up arrow will close the submenu
- Clicking on a submenu item will close the submenu and main menu and redirect to that page
- The username should appear at the bottom of the main navigation, it is not clickable
- Beneath the username should be a Logout link(for now, more to come)
- Hover states should be disabled for mobile
- Tooltips for the top icons should be disabled
- The user should be able to scroll the entire nav
